int skysim
 1: we are doing skycoverage preprocessing

Detailed Description

contains input parameters for simulation, like loop gain, seeds, etc.

Field Documentation

double SIM_CFG_T::dt

sampling period.

1/800

double SIM_CFG_T::za

zenith angle in radian

int SIM_CFG_T::start

time step to start simulation.

0

int SIM_CFG_T::end

time step to stop simulation.

exclusive

int* SIM_CFG_T::seeds

simulation seeds

int SIM_CFG_T::nseed

How many simulation seed.

int SIM_CFG_T::frozenflow

frozen flow.

automatic if closeloop=1

int SIM_CFG_T::nthread

Number of threads to run the simulation.

int SIM_CFG_T::closeloop

closed loop or open loop

char* SIM_CFG_T::gtypeII_lo

contains 3x1 or 3xnmod type II gains.

double* SIM_CFG_T::apdm

servo coefficient for high order dm.

A is command. e is error signal. at time step n, the command is updated by A(n)=A(n-1)*apdm(0)+A(n-2)*ap(1)+...+e(n-2)*ep

double* SIM_CFG_T::apngs

servo coefficient for ngs modes.

double* SIM_CFG_T::apupt

servo coefficient for for LGS uplink pointing loop.

double SIM_CFG_T::epdm

error gain for DM commands (high order)

double SIM_CFG_T::epngs

error gain for NGS modes (low order)

double SIM_CFG_T::epupt

error gain for uplink pointing

double SIM_CFG_T::dpupt

derivative tracking for uplink pointer.

keep 0 to disable

double SIM_CFG_T::epfocus

error gain for LGS focus tracking with zoom optics

double SIM_CFG_T::lpfocus

parameter for low pass filter of LGS focus tracking with offset

int SIM_CFG_T::napdm

number of entries in apdm

int SIM_CFG_T::napngs

number of entries in apngs

int SIM_CFG_T::napupt

number of entries in apupt

int SIM_CFG_T::mffocus

method for focus tracing.

  • 0: no focus tracking.
  • use CL grads + DM grads - Xhat grad for LGS and NGS.
  • use CL grads + DM grads - Xhat grad for LGS;

int SIM_CFG_T::uptideal

ideal compensation for uplink pointing

int SIM_CFG_T::servotype_hi

servo type for high order loop.

1: simple integrator

int SIM_CFG_T::servotype_lo

servo type for low order loop.

1: simple integrator. 2: type II

int SIM_CFG_T::cachedm

cache dm shape on fine sampled grid matched WFS or Science grid

int SIM_CFG_T::cachesurf

cache surface on fine sampled grid matched WFS or Science grid

int SIM_CFG_T::fuseint

fuse the high and low order integrators in split tomography

int SIM_CFG_T::skysim

1: we are doing skycoverage preprocessing
